title: Bad Luck Officer
description: Suzie Ivy graduated the police academy and now faces the streets of Small Town, Arizona as a cop for the first time.Against all odds, at age forty-five, Suzie Ivy graduated from the police academy. Now her life as the first female officer in Small Town, Arizona begins. From pink handcuffs to a shotgun named The Rock (Rock Hudson), life in Small Town will never be the same.Bad Luck Officer takes you for a joy ride as Suzie works her first two “cop” years on the streets. Bulls, bad guys and humor will get her through the career of her dreams and will it?This is the true-life adventure of a woman faced with a midlife crisis and empty nest syndrome. There are no tears in baseball but there are hidden tears in law enforcement when Suzie Ivy is on the case.
author: Suzie Ivy
